languages.text: Сказал{mf||а} Хейнриксу не использовать биомантию на мутанте, чтобы не продлевать их страдания.
Told Heinrix not to use biomancy on the mutant so as not to prolong their suffering.
languages.original_text: Сказал{mf||а} Хейнриксу не использовать биомантию на мутанте, чтобы не продлевать их страдания.

traits.locale_text: Told Heinrix not to use biomancy on the mutant so as not to prolong their suffering.
Told Heinrix not to use biomancy on the mutant so as not to prolong their suffering.
Told Heinrix not to use biomancy on the mutant so as not to prolong their suffering.
Told Heinrix not to use biomancy on the mutant so as not to prolong their suffering.
Told Heinrix not to use biomancy on the mutant so as not to prolong their suffering.

languages.text: 你告诉海因里希，不要对变种人使用生物法术，这会延长变种人的痛苦。
languages.original_text: Told Heinrix not to use biomancy on the mutant so as not to prolong their suffering.

traits.locale_text: 你告诉海因里希，不要对变种人使用生物法术，这会延长变种人的痛苦。

languages.text: Heinrix befohlen, keine Biomantie gegen den Mutanten einzusetzen, um sein Leid nicht zu verlängern.
languages.original_text: Told Heinrix not to use biomancy on the mutant so as not to prolong their suffering.

traits.locale_text: Heinrix befohlen, keine Biomantie gegen den Mutanten einzusetzen, um sein Leid nicht zu verlängern.

languages.text: Vous avez dit à Heinrix de ne pas utiliser la biomancie sur les mutants pour ne pas prolonger leurs souffrances.
languages.original_text: Told Heinrix not to use biomancy on the mutant so as not to prolong their suffering.

traits.locale_text: Vous avez dit à Heinrix de ne pas utiliser la biomancie sur les mutants pour ne pas prolonger leurs souffrances.

languages.text: Has ordenado a Heinrix que no use biomancia con el mutante para no prolongar su sufrimiento.
languages.original_text: Told Heinrix not to use biomancy on the mutant so as not to prolong their suffering.

traits.locale_text: Has ordenado a Heinrix que no use biomancia con el mutante para no prolongar su sufrimiento.

languages.text: ハインリックスに、変異体の苦しみを長引かせないためにも、生体秘法を使わないように言った。
languages.original_text: Told Heinrix not to use biomancy on the mutant so as not to prolong their suffering.

traits.locale_text: ハインリックスに、変異体の苦しみを長引かせないためにも、生体秘法を使わないように言った。

languages.text: Mutantın ızdırabını uzatmamak için Heinrix'e biyobazlık yapmamasını söyledin.
languages.original_text: Told Heinrix not to use biomancy on the mutant so as not to prolong their suffering.

traits.locale_text: Mutantın ızdırabını uzatmamak adına Heinrix’e biyobüyü yapmamasını söyledin.
